summary_short: Rodion Raskolnikov is the most connected figure (7 ties). Key relationship types: colleague.
highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (7), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (4), Pulcheria Alexandrovna Raskolnikova (4), Porfiry Petrovich (3)
story_summary: Raskolnikov enters a room with Razumihin, who is awkward and embarrassed. They meet Porfiry Petrovitch, who is intrigued by Raskolnikov's visit, as he has a matter of business to discuss. Raskolnikov pretends to be embarrassed about his financial situation while claiming ownership of some items related to a murder case, and the conversation becomes increasingly tense as Porfiry questions him.
